summary: THE VEHICLE COLLAPSED WITHOUT ANY WARNING. THE DRIVER MANAGED TO GET CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  THE DRIVER CHECKED THE VEHICLE AND NOTICED THAT THE FRONT SUSPENSION BROKE.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALERSHIP.   *NLM   THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN THE DRIVEWAY, THE CONSUMER TRIED TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE INTO THE GARAGE WHEN THE RIGHT FRONT COLLAPSED.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THIS WAS DUE TO RUSTING.  *SC  *JB
